law.full_text:
VIOLATION/PENALTY.
Violations of this chapter shall be treated as a strict liability offense regardless of intent. Any person, firm and/or corporation that violates any portion of this section shall be subject to prosecution and/or administrative enforcement under the Los Angeles Municipal Code. Administrative penalties imposed pursuant to this ordinance shall not exceed $100,000 per property.

unit.catch_line: Recordation Of Transfer Of Loan And/Or Deed Of Trust And/Or Assignment Of Rents.
Maintenance And Enforcement Of Maintenance Requirements.
Maintenance Of Vacant Properties And Enforcement Of Vacant Property Maintenance Requirements.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
VIOLATION/PENALTY. (§ 164.08)
VIOLATION/PENALTY. Violations of this chapter shall be treated as a strict liability offense regardless of intent. Any person, firm and/or corporation that violates any portion of this section shall be subject to prosecution and/or administrative enforcement under the Los Angeles Municipal Code. Administrative penalties imposed pursuant to this ordinance shall not exceed $100,000 per property.
law.html:
VIOLATION/PENALTY.

Violations of this chapter shall be treated as a strict liability offense regardless of intent.  Any person, firm and/or corporation that violates any portion of this section shall be subject to prosecution and/or administrative enforcement under the Los Angeles Municipal Code.  Administrative penalties imposed pursuant to this ordinance shall not exceed $100,000 per property.
